mcq.statement: Choose the sentence with a semantic error: The herculean effort required to complete the task was undeniable.

options.a: The herculean effort required to complete the task was undeniable
options.b: The cacophonous symphony of the city streets was oddly soothing.
options.c: The scientist's groundbreaking discovery left the world in a state of awe
options.d: Her altruistic disposition was as clear as a cloudy day.
